inclusion.criterion: undergo a full history and physical exam
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: an audiogram performed as standard of care for evaluation and management of chronic tinnitus
inclusion.label: met

notes: A 39-year-old man with a history of asthma, experiencing symptoms that worsen at work and improve outside the workplace. He uses inhaled corticosteroid (ICS) and fluticasone 500 mcg/salmeterol 50 mcg.
